name: BLACKOUT: Into The Unknown
description:
BLACKOUT: Into The Unknown

The actions in the world are in the futuristic, where on some planet all transport links were kept on an automated system. But because of the solar storm, the navigation systems were out of order and the cities were cut off from each other.

The main character is an ordinary repair engineer who has a long way to go to restore communications on the planet.

In the demo version, the hero will have to find a garage and open it, find spare parts for the car at the junkyard, charge the battery and activate 3 antennas on the plateau and one at the station behind the cave. Repair the car and drive away into the sunset...
